trends: There have been no other sightings in Vernon
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat or around 2:50 am , i was posted in a guard shack in the city of vernon, ca near grande vista\ washington blvd directly across form the local ups hub. the filed supervisor had just left the property. it was a cloudy, windy night. i was reading a magazine, and listening to the radio.i noticed something out of the corner of my eye which at first appeared to be a large ballon stuck on an overhead powerline( similar to a child's ball on string attached to wooden paddle) it did this for about a minute, suddenly it started to move in a circular motion very fast for about 15 seconds, i finally turned my full attention to the object, and notice that it was a really large circular blueish gray object about 3 to 4 stories hovering above the empty warehouse. i sat in the shack amazed for about a minute, i then tried to contact my supervisor via cellphone to ask him if he could see what i'm looking at , but he told me he could not because he was already past whittier blvd. in east la. i then grabbed my fast light and started to walk to rear of the property. the object then floated like a leaf on water from above the warehouse toward a large metal power line aparatus over the railroad tracks about 5 to 6 stories up and hovered there for several minutes. i went to the chainlink fenece and started to try to signal to the oject with my flashlight(turning it off and on) after several minutes it slowly started to drift southwest of my location( off of washingthon blvd) over the emplty ups hub it stopped, lit up in a bright yellowlight from the bottom up very similar to match or oven and dissapeared from sight.
Summary: while working a graveyard security job( facility was closed) I obvered an object fyling about three stories high above the warehouse
